meanings.definition: Relating to or resembling a lemniscus.
meanings.sent1: The lemniscal pathway in the brain helps transmit sensory information.
meanings.sent2: The lemniscal neurons play a crucial role in relaying signals to the brain.
meanings.sent3: The lemniscal connection between the nerves is like a well-organized highway system.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts traveled along the lemniscal route, reaching her brain with clarity.
meanings.sent5: The lemniscal characteristics of the pathway make it efficient and reliable.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the sensory pathway in the brainstem.
meanings.sent1: The lemniscal fibers carry sensory information to the brainstem.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the lemniscal pathway to understand sensory processing.
meanings.sent3: The lemniscal signals in the brainstem were like messengers delivering important news.
meanings.sent4: His focus was as sharp and direct as a lemniscal connection.
meanings.sent5: The lemniscal pathway ensures swift communication between the body and the brainstem.
